com.thesonofthom.tools

Class BufferMap.BitsField

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thesonofthom.tools.BufferMap.AbstractField
      • com.thesonofthom.tools.BufferMap.BitsField
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BufferMap.BitField, BufferMap.EnumBitsField
    Enclosing class:
    BufferMap

    public class BufferMap.BitsField
extends BufferMap.AbstractField
    This class is for fields that are less than a single byte long. this class considers the start bit offset of a field to be the lower order bit of the field (e.g. if the field is bits 3, 2, and 1 of a byte, then the start bit is 1 and the sizeInBits is 3)

    When declaring the different BitsFields in a byte, declare the lower-order bit fields first (i.e start with the field that starts at bit 0, and end with the field that ends at bit 7)
